page.title: 09INTERESTS, GAMES and HOBBIES
page.content:
My name is Debbie. In my spare time I go riding and I read.I started riding when I was two. My mum bought me a pony from a riding school and she taught me how to ride.When I was a bit better at riding my mum took me hunting and she led me.I like riding because I can go onto the moor.I ride at shows, I hunt and things like that. I read in my bedroom where it is quiet. I like reading because there are alot of good stories I enjoy.
My name is Charlotte. In my spare time I go roller-skating and running. I go roller-skating around the road and running on the fields. I go running because I am quite good at it. I like roller-skating because I have some skates.
